name: Grooto
description:
Build your way with your roots!

Puzzle and platform game, where you have to help Grooto, a little mole, find his home. To do this, Grooto will use the roots of his garden to reach his destination, so join Grooto in this adventure!

In order to reset the level press R!

Developed by: Nacho Croche, Alvaro Herreros, Celia Cifuentes, Maria Baselga,  Francisco Diaz, Rafael Jerez, Rita Aldea, Aranzazu Mozos
